subject: Football
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: Panthers Coach Ron Rivera told reporters that Derek Anderson, Newton’s backup, would start Sunday against Tampa Bay and that Newton was unlikely to play after sustaining two fractures in his back in a car accident.
snippet: Panthers Coach Ron Rivera told reporters that Derek Anderson, Newton’s backup, would start Sunday against Tampa Bay and that Newton was unlikely to play after sustaining two fractures in his back in a car accident.
